live_updates: On-site technicians continue working diligently to resolve this outage. Thank you for your patience.
65439.summary: Some customers in the Red Bluff area of Quesnel are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
65439.title: Aug 13 - Quesnel (Red Bluff) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
